Darkfate:

""

Darkfate::

"Go ahead, Orchestra..." said the Dragon "As soon as you get results 
of your first task, I like to know it..."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra/Triggerhappy/Bodicons/Cutthroat::
> 
>     Orchestra nodded.
> 
>     "You can count on me commander!" Orchestra said in pride.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Triggerhappy transformed to jet mode and flew off torwards a 
location near the CF, following Autofire.
> 
>      Explobody transformed into his bird bomber mode.  Legtrap 
transformed into his mole mode, and went onto Explobody's back.  
Explobody took off, following Triggerhappy and Autofire towards the 
CF.  Headshot transformed into his mechanical leopard mode, and 
Gutclaw transformed to mechanical velociraptor mode.  Headshot and 
Gutclaw ran off towards the CF as well, while at the same time both 
of them having a running contest to see who could run faster.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>            Cutthroat just stood near Hun-Grr and the other 
Terrorcons, ready to go when they were.
